LanguageData.AnimaJoint.label: anima joint
LanguageData.AnimaJoint.description: Anima fibers prepared in small rolls for smoking. Surprisingly, the drug improves psychic sensivity.\n\nThese joints are the legacy of the old chemists from the Elders faction.
LanguageData.AnimaTea.label: anima tea
LanguageData.AnimaTea.description: A fragrant tea infused with anima fibers.This tea provides mental relaxation to help dissipate neural heat. Very useful for psycasters.
LanguageData.SacOfKnowledge.label: sac of knowledge
LanguageData.SacOfKnowledge.description: This sac contains some anima fibers and other ingridients you haven't ever seen. Very strange, but pawn that consumes these herbs receives psylink.
